Title: Relates to prohibiting insurance companies from denying coverage for individuals that have taken or are currently taking pre-exposure prophylaxis or post-exposure prophylaxis
Summary: Relates to prohibiting insurance companies from denying coverage for individuals that have taken or are currently taking pre-exposure prophylaxis for the prevention of HIV or post-exposure prophylaxis to prevent HIV infection.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting insurance companies from denying coverage for individuals that have taken or are currently taking pre-exposure prophylaxis or post-exposure prophylaxis
